title: Rescue Volo
content:
out of the group) and then return to camp without them. Ask Volo to try and remove your eye and you should not lose approval from them.

How to unlock Rescue Volo

Upon entering the Goblin Camp, you will find Volo performing in front of the Goblins. He clearly needs help to escape the Goblin Camp. You receive the quest immediately.

Rescue Volo Rewards

Volo may join your camp.

Rescue Volo Notes & Tips

After accepting Volo's operation and eye replacement you may not offer your other eye to Aun
